Description.Name: Chameleon Light Polarization Shield
Description.Details: The Chameleon Light Polarization Shield renders a BattleMech invisible to the naked eye and sensors that operate in the visible spectrum. It employs a primitive mimetic system that disrupts the BattleMech's outline, making it blend into the surrounding terrain. Developed alongside the Null Signature System by the Terran Hegemony, the Chameleon LPS was a closely guarded technology and never widely deployed.
